name: Automate Social Media Headlines with Bright Data & n8n

user.name: Yaron Been
user.bio:
Building AI Agents and Automations | Growth Marketer | Entrepreneur | Book Author & Podcast Host

If you need any help with Automations, feel free to reach out via linkedin:

And check out my Youtube channel:

description:
# 
## Description

This workflow automatically finds trending headlines and content from various sources and posts them to your social media accounts. It helps maintain an active social media presence without the daily manual effort of content curation.

## Overview

This workflow automatically scrapes trending headlines and content from various sources and posts them to your social media accounts. It uses Bright Data to access content and n8n to schedule and post to platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, or Facebook.

### Tools Used

*   **n8n:** The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow.
*   **Bright Data:** For scraping trending content from news sites, blogs, or other sources without getting blocked.
*   **Social Media APIs:** To post content to your accounts.

## How to Install

1.  **Import the Workflow:** Download the `.json` file and import it into your n8n instance.
2.  **Configure Bright Data:** Add your Bright Data credentials to the Bright Data node.
3.  **Connect Social Media:** Authenticate your social media accounts.
4.  **Customize:** Set your content preferences, posting schedule, and hashtag strategy.

## Use Cases

*   **Social Media Managers:** Automate content curation and posting.
*   **Content Creators:** Share trending topics in your niche.
*   **Businesses:** Maintain an active social media presence with minimal effort.

---

## Connect with Me

*   **Website:** [https://www.nofluff.online](https://www.nofluff.online)
*   **YouTube:** [https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos](https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos)
*   **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/)
*   **Get Bright Data:** [https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25](https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25) (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

options.systemMessage: Extract the headline and write a post for LinkedIn based on the headline
Extract the headline and write a post for Twitter based on the headline

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# ‚ö° Automated Vogue Headline ‚Üí Social Media Poster

### üß† Purpose:

Automatically scrape trending headlines from Vogue, convert them into engaging posts using AI, and publish them to **LinkedIn** and **Twitter (X)** ‚Äî *no manual effort needed*.

---

## üî∂ **Section 1: Set the Target Source**

üìå *Nodes:*

* `Run workflow`
* `Set Target News URL`

### üõ† What‚Äôs Happening:

* ‚úÖ `Run workflow`: Triggers the automation either manually or on a schedule (e.g., daily).
* üñä `Set Target News URL`: Sets the **source URL** (e.g., `https://www.vogue.com/fashion`) from where the headlines will be scraped.

### üí° Why It Matters:

This lets you choose your news source dynamically. You could even expand this later for other websites like *TechCrunch, Forbes, etc.*

> ![üß≠](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/compass_1f9ed.png) Think of this section as the **GPS** ‚Äì it tells the system where to go fetch the news from.

---

## üî∑ **Section 2: Scrape & Extract Headlines**

üìå *Nodes:*

* `Scrape Vogue via Bright Data`
* `Extract Title`

### üõ† What‚Äôs Happening:

* üåê `Scrape Vogue via Bright Data`: Uses **Bright Data Web Unlocker** to bypass bot protection and get the full HTML of the Vogue page using a POST request.
* üßæ `Extract Title`: Extracts the headline(s) from the HTML using a CSS selector like `.article-feed-card__hed-text`.

### üí° Why It Matters:

Some websites block scraping ‚Äî **Bright Data** ensures you can reliably extract content. The extractor node ensures you get clean, usable text.

> ![üï∏Ô∏è](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/spider-web_1f578-fe0f.png) This is your **web crawler** and **filter**, doing the dirty work of fetching and cleaning up info.

---

## üü£ **Section 3: Use AI to Write Engaging Posts**

üìå *Nodes:*

* `LinkedIn post writer`
* `X (Twitter) post writer`

### üõ† What‚Äôs Happening:

* ü§ñ `LinkedIn post writer`: Passes the headline to an OpenAI Chat Model to turn it into a professional, catchy LinkedIn post.
* üê¶ `X (Twitter) post writer`: Similarly formats a shorter, witty version for X/Twitter.

Both use prompts like:

> ‚ÄúWrite a trendy post about the following Vogue headline for \[LinkedIn/Twitter]. Add hashtags. Keep tone professional/casual.‚Äù

### üí° Why It Matters:

AI tailors each post **per platform** ‚Äî no copy-pasting. Your brand voice is preserved while staying context-aware.

> ![‚úçÔ∏è](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/writing-hand_270d-fe0f.png) This is your **copywriting intern** ‚Äî except it works 24/7 and never gets tired.

---

## üî¥ **Section 4: Auto-Publish to Social Media**

üìå *Nodes:*

* `Publish to LinkedIn`
* `Publish to X (Twitter)`

### üõ† What‚Äôs Happening:

* üíº `Publish to LinkedIn`: Posts the AI-generated content directly to your **LinkedIn page or profile**.
* üì£ `Publish to X (Twitter)`: Tweets the optimized content via your **Twitter developer account**.

> Note: These nodes are showing ‚ö†Ô∏è errors ‚Äî make sure authentication and permissions (tokens) are set up correctly.

### üí° Why It Matters:

This eliminates **manual social media posting** ‚Äî great for content marketers, personal branding, or agencies.

> ![üöÄ](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/rocket_1f680.png) This section is your **launchpad**, sending your posts to the world.

---

# üß© Summary Table

| Section | Function                     | What It Does                                     | Key Tools                      |
| ------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| 1       | Set Target URL               | Tells the system what site to scrape             | `Manual Trigger`, `Set Node`   |
| 2       | Scrape & Extract             | Uses Bright Data to get HTML + Extract headlines | `HTTP Request`, `HTML Extract` |
| 3       | AI Content Generation        | Converts headline into social media post         | `OpenAI`, `Chat Model`         |
| 4       | Auto-Publish to Social Media | Posts to LinkedIn and Twitter                    | `LinkedIn`, `X/Twitter`        |

---

# ‚ú® Bonus Suggestions

‚úÖ Add a **scheduler** to run this daily
‚úÖ Log posted headlines in **Google Sheets or Notion**
‚úÖ Add a filter to **skip duplicate headlines**

---
